name: Revolutionaries vs Oppressors
description:
Multiplayer Warfare Simulator for Southampton Game Jam 2017

by Luismi Herrera, Chris Green, Hale Harding and Alex Parker

Controls

Red Team

  • A,Z = Select Factory
  • 1,2,3,4 = Spawn Unit

Blue Team

  • Up,Down Arrow = Select Factory
  • Numpad 1,2,3,4 = Spawn Unit

Summary

Manage your resources to spawn infantry and tank units in an attempt to destroy the opponent's base.

  • 2 player
  • 4 unit classes
  • 3 lanes
  • simulated combat
